Projects:

· Project #1 : 304160b
           Technologies         :           Java, Micro Services with Spring Boot, Json, MongoDB,            
                                                        
           Platform                 :           Linux (Kubernets Cluster)
           Role                         :          Developer
           Team size               :          8
           Client                      :          AT&T

Description: The Functionality of 304160b is, here we are collecting data from the different sources through EGF (Event Generation Framework) when any change event will occurs in different Source level.
304160b Modules Include:
· CDC (Change Data Capture) is capturing the new Event Occurred in different Source level.
· Doc (Document Object Constructor) is listening to CDC event through Kafka and it will prepared Json Data according the CDC event  which was occurred in different  source level for different domains and publish to respective domains DMAPP.
· Different Domains Micro Services will subscribe to respective DMAPP Messages and according to event it will perform different operation and store into respective mongo collection.
· AssetInventoryCache will receive all the domains data and put it into the Mongo collection.
Responsibilities: 
· Involved in the Client requirements discussion & Analysis 
· Coordination with client, coding and end to end testing. 
· Involved in all project planning & designing.
· Involved in Daily Scrum Meetings and status calls for project

· Project #2 : 302266
           Technologies         :           Java, Micro Services with Spring Boot, Json, MongoDB,            
                                                        
           Platform                 :           Linux (Kubernets Cluster)
           Role                         :          Developer
           Team size               :          8
           Client                      :          AT&T

Description: The Functionality of 302266, We are  retrieving  the topology data for different Assets from the MongoDB collection for Billing System (BilledServiceInventoryCache).

302266 Modules Include:
· CDC (Change Data Capture) is capturing the new Event Occurred in Source level.
· Doc (Document Object Constructor) is listening to CDC event through Kafka and it will prepared Json Data according the CDC event  which was occurred in source level for respective Asset domain and publish to DMAPP.
· Asset will subscribe the event and store into MongoDB collection.
· BilledServiceInventoryCache call the AssetTopology api to collect the topology information’s.
 
Responsibilities: 
· Involved in the Client requirements discussion & Analysis 
· Coordination with client, coding and end to end testing. 
· Involved in all project planning & designing.
· Involved in Daily Scrum Meetings and status calls for project.

· Project #3 : TATA USP(Universal Subscription Platform)
Technologies 	               :	 Java, JSP/Servlets, Hibernate, Mysql, XML, Tomcat 
Platform		:	 Linux (Cent OS 6)
Role		               :	 Developer
Team size		:	 3
 Client 		               :	 Tata Tele Services Ltd.

Description:  WiFi Universal Subscription Platform has innovative features for the subscribers to subscribe through IVR, SMS, and USSD. This also has the provision for user to manage his/her activation/ deactivation, charging and renewal information for VAS services. The same can be done on portal where user should register to manage his account.
USP Modules Include:
· OBD Platform - For free outbound calling, promotion module for CRBT marketing activities (with advanced call patch application and integrated dedicated charging proxy).
· Customer Care IVR- To handle all subscribers’ calls related to CRBT queries and monitoring.
· SMS Application for Promotions, subscription reminders, notifications etc.
· USSD Application for Promotions, subscription, notifications etc.
· Customer Care Web Interface for handling customer queries and deactivation requests. And Automatic daily report as per the formats shared by client for all the modules.

Universal Subscription Platform Features:
· Activation/ Deactivation of VAS service.
· Dynamic menu creation.
· SMS / USSD notifications to subscriber on service status.
· White list content/service for specific subscribers based on his/her profile.
Responsibilities: 
· Involved in the Client requirements discussion & Analysis.
· Coordination with client. 
· Involved in Overall project planning, designing & coding.
· Designing of Database for modules.

· Project #4 : COLLECT CALL
Technologies 	:	 Java, JSP/Servlets, Hibernate, MariaDB, Tomcat 
Platform		:	 Linux (Cent OS 6)
Role		               :	 Developer
Team size		:	 3

Description:  WiFi Collect Call is a very nice product/service for the subscribers. Incase if A party having zero balance but they can talk with to B party. User can manage his/her activation/deactivation, charging, renewal information via IVR, USSD, and SMS. 
Collect Call Modules Include:
· IVR- To handle all subscribers’ calls related to Collect Call service activation/deactivation and monitoring.
· SMS Application for Billing, Subscription status, notifications etc.
· USSD Application to handle all subscribers for Collect Call service activation/deactivation.
· Customer Care Web Interface for handling customer queries and deactivation requests. And reports as per the formats shared by client for all the modules.
Collect Call Platform Features:
· Activation/ Deactivation of Collect Call service.
· Dynamic menu creation.
· SMS / USSD / IVR notifications to subscriber on service status.
Responsibilities:
